nodes.text: Space waffles were a type of food that could be found on the planet of Lothal by 3272 LY. Old Jho's Pit Stop served them with muja sauce topping, which was favored by Kanan Jarrus. Space waffles were also served at the wharf on Level 1313 of Coruscant's underworld during the Clone Wars.

Hera Syndulla once added space waffles to her shopping list, among other things. Garazeb Orrelios' crewmates Ezra Bridger and Chopper once interrupted his meal of space waffles. Z'Vk'Thkrkza, proprietor of Aunt Z's Tavern on the Colossus, had a tattoo of a space waffle and crossed cooking implements on her shoulder.
